mapper.select: select ShopSecName '店铺名称',substring(SaleDate,0,11) '日期',OrderInfo.OrderID '订单编号',orderExpressInfo.TheExpressNo '运单编号',FulfillmentChannel,OrderInfo.OrderState, sysWeight,orderExpressInfo.OrderWeight,Country '国家', sum(CAST(isnull(CASE isnumeric(OrderFreight) when 1 then OrderFreight else null end, 0) AS decimal(10, 2)))'运费', matrix_id'母体编号', Price, sum(CAST(isnull(CASE isnumeric(Cost) when 1 then Cost else null end, 0) AS decimal(10, 2))*OutboundNumder)'成本', sum(OutboundNumder)'产品数', PI.ID'产品编号', ProChnName from OrderInfo left join orderExpressInfo on OrderInfo.OrderID=orderExpressInfo.OrderID left join ShopInfo SI on OrderInfo.ShopID = SI.ID left join OutboundInfo OB on OB.SystemNumber=OrderInfo.SystemNumber left join ProductInfo PI on PI.ID=OB.OutboundGoodsID where OrderInfo.UserID in (select id from UserInfo where groupId in (#{groupIds})) and SaleDate> #{start} and SaleDate < #{end} group by OrderInfo.OrderID,orderExpressInfo.TheExpressNo, sysWeight,orderExpressInfo.OrderWeight,Country,FulfillmentChannel,OrderInfo.OrderState,ShopSecName,substring(SaleDate,0,11),PI.ID, ProChnName, ProEghName, matrix_id,Price order by ShopSecName,substring(SaleDate,0,11);
select OrderID from OrderInfo oi left join OutboundInfo ob on oi.SystemNumber=ob.SystemNumber where ob.ID=#{id}
